mapper.select: select ifnull(level,0) from sawon where sabun=#{sabun} and pwd=#{pwd}
select * from board where grp=#{grp} order by id desc limit #{index},10
mapper.insert: insert into board (sabun, title, content, grp, writeday) values (#{sabun}, #{title}, #{content}, #{grp}, now())
mapper.select: select ceil(count(*)/10) from board where grp=#{grp}
select * from sawon where sabun like concat(#{depart},'%')
select ceil(count(*)/#{pageSize}) from memo where reSabun=#{sabun} and delstate=0
select ceil(count(*)/#{pageSize}) from memo where seSabun=#{sabun} and delstate=0
mapper.update: update commute set toHome=now(), state=if(TIMESTAMPDIFF(hour,toWork,now())>=8,3, if(TIMESTAMPDIFF(hour,toWork,now())>=4,4,5)) where sabun=#{sabun} and writeday=curdate()
mapper.select: select count(*) from commute where sabun=#{sabun} and writeday=curdate()
select * from sawon where sabun like concat(#{depart},'%') and sabun!='admin'
select ifnull(max(right(sabun,3)),0)+1 from sawon where sabun like concat (#{depart},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into sawon(sabun, name,pwd, phone, email, ipsa, level, writeday) values (#{sabun}, #{name}, #{pwd}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{ipsa}, #{level}, now())
mapper.delete: delete from sawon where sabun=#{sabun} and id=#{id}
